lead_paragraph: The postponement of Game 6 had its pluses and minuses, and made the Cardinals’ Chris Carpenter an option for Game 7, if the World Series gets that far.
snippet: The postponement of Game 6 had its pluses and minuses, and made the Cardinals’ Chris Carpenter an option for Game 7, if the World Series gets that far.
